tokens: <h2>uif-breadcrumb</h2> <button class="ms-Button" (click)="toggleBreacrumbMaxItems()"> <span class="ms-Button-label">Toggle Max Items to 3</span> </button> <br /> <uif-breadcrumb [maxDisplayedItems]="maxDisplayedItems" [items]="breadcrumbItems"></uif-breadcrumb>

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-breadcrumb-demo', templateUrl: './app-breadcrumb-demo.component.html', }) export class BreadcrumbDemoComponent { maxDisplayedItems = null; breadcrumbItems = [ { text: 'Files', 'key': 'Files' }, { text: 'Folder 1', 'key': 'f1' }, { text: 'Folder 2', 'key': 'f2' }, { text: 'Folder 3', 'key': 'f3' }, { text: 'Folder 4', 'key': 'f4' }, { text: 'Folder 5', 'key': 'f5' }, { text: 'Folder 6', 'key': 'f6', href: 'http://bing.com', openInNewTab: true }, ]; toggleBreacrumbMaxItems() { if (this.maxDisplayedItems === 3) { this.maxDisplayedItems = null; } else { this.maxDisplayedItems = 3; } } }

<h2>uif-button</h2> <div style="display: block; padding: 0 0 24px 0;"> <h4>Default Button</h4> <uif-button (click)="showAlert($event)">This is a sample button!</uif-button> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <uif-button (click)="showAlert($event)" disabled="true">This is a sample button!</uif-button> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <uif-button (click)="showAlert($event)" [icon]="'Mail'">This is a sample button!</uif-button> <div class="horizontal-separator"></div> <h4>Hero Button</h4> <uif-hero-button (click)="showAlert($event)" [icon]="'Mail'">This is a sample button!</uif-hero-button> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <uif-hero-button (click)="showAlert($event)" [icon]="'Mail'" disabled="true">This is a sample button!</uif-hero-button> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <h4>Default Button with Primary</h4> <uif-button (click)="showAlert($event)" [primary]="true">This is a sample button!</uif-button> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <uif-button (click)="showAlert($event)" [primary]="true" disabled="true">This is a sample button!</uif-button> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <uif-button (click)="showAlert($event)" [primary]="true" [icon]="'Mail'">This is a sample button!</uif-button> <div class="horizontal-separator"></div> <h4>Compound Button </h4> <uif-compound-button (click)="showAlert($event)" [description]="description">Button</uif-compound-button> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <uif-compound-button (click)="showAlert($event)" [description]="description" disabled="true">Button</uif-compound-button> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <uif-compound-button (click)="showAlert($event)" [description]="description" [primary]="true">Button</uif-compound-button> </div>

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-button-demo', templateUrl: './app-button-demo.component.html', }) export class ButtonDemoComponent { description = 'This is a sample button description'; showAlert($event) { window.alert('Button clicked'); } }

<h2>uif-callout</h2> <div style="display: block; padding: 0 0 24px 0;"> <form> <div style="display:inline-block;"> <h4>Direction Hint</h4> <select name="directionHint" [(ngModel)]="directionHint"> <option *ngFor="let hint of directionHints" [value]="hint.key">{{hint.text}}</option> </select> </div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div style="display:inline-block;"> <h4>Trigger Hint</h4> <select name="triggerHint" [(ngModel)]="triggerHint"> <option *ngFor="let hint of triggerHints" [value]="hint.key">{{hint.text}}</option> </select> </div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div style="display:inline-block;"> <h4>Show Arrow</h4> <select name="showArrow" [(ngModel)]="showArrow"> <option *ngFor="let item of arrowOptions" [value]="item.key">{{item.text}}</option> </select> </div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div style="display:inline-block;"> <h4>Gap</h4> <input name="gap" [(ngModel)]="gap" type="number" max="30" min="0" step="1" > </div> </form> <div style="display:block; margin: 30px auto;text-align:center"> <uif-callout showClose="true" [showArrow]="showArrow" [directionalHint]="directionHint" [gap]="gap" [triggerHint]="triggerHint"> <uif-callout-header>All of your favorite people</uif-callout-header> <uif-callout-content>Message body is optional. If help documentation is available, consider adding a link to learn more at the bottom.</uif-callout-content> <uif-callout-actions> <a class="ms-Link">Learn more</a> </uif-callout-actions> <uif-open-callout> <uif-button>Show Default Callout</uif-button> </uif-open-callout> </uif-callout> </div> </div>

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { UifCalloutDirectionalHint, UifCalloutTriggerHint } from '../../uif-fabric/uif-callout/uif-callout.models'; import { UifCalloutContentComponent } from '../../uif-fabric/uif-callout/uif-callout-subcomponents.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-callout-demo', templateUrl: './app-callout-demo.component.html', }) export class CalloutDemoComponent implements OnInit { showArrow = true; UifCalloutDirectionalHints = UifCalloutDirectionalHint; UifCalloutTriggerHints = UifCalloutTriggerHint; directionHints = []; arrowOptions = []; triggerHints = []; directionHint: UifCalloutDirectionalHint = UifCalloutDirectionalHint.TopCenter; triggerHint: UifCalloutTriggerHint = UifCalloutTriggerHint.ClickInClickOut; gap: Number = 10; ngOnInit() { this.arrowOptions = [ { key: true, text: 'Yes'}, { key: false, text: 'No'} ]; this.directionHints = [ { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.TopLeftEdge, text: 'Top Left Edge' }, { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.TopCenter, text: 'Top Center' }, { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.TopRightEdge, text: 'Top Right Edge' }, { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.BottomLeftEdge, text: 'Bottom Left Edge' }, { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.BottomCenter, text: 'Bottom Center' }, { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.BottomRightEdge, text: 'Bottom Right Edge' }, { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.LeftTopEdge, text: 'Left Top Edge' }, { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.LeftCenter, text: 'Left Center' }, { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.LeftBottomEdge, text: 'Left Bottom Edge' }, { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.RightTopEdge, text: 'Right Top Edge' }, { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.RightCenter, text: 'Right Center' }, { key: UifCalloutDirectionalHint.RightBottomEdge, text: 'Right Bottom Edge' }, ]; this.triggerHints = [ { key: UifCalloutTriggerHint.ClickInClickOut, text: 'ClickInClickOut' }, { key: UifCalloutTriggerHint.FocusInBlurOut, text: 'FocusInBlurOut' }, { key: UifCalloutTriggerHint.HoverInBlurOut, text: 'HoverInBlurOut' } ]; } onHintSelected(data) { console.log('onHintSelected', data); } showCallout() { console.log('showCallout'); } }

<h2>uif-contextual-menu</h2> <div style="display: block; padding: 0 0 24px 0;"> <h4>Default Contextual Menu</h4> <uif-contextualmenu [(isOpen)]="openMenu1"> <uif-button menuTrigger (click)="openMenu1 = !openMenu1"> <span [hidden]="openMenu1">Open</span> <span [hidden]="!openMenu1">Close</span> Contextual Menu</uif-button> <div menuItem> Animals</div> <div menuItem *ngFor="let item of menuItems">{{item.text}}</div> </uif-contextualmenu> <div class="horizontal-separator"></div> <h4>Contextual Menu With Header & Divider</h4> <uif-contextualmenu [(isOpen)]="openMenu2" [directionHint]="DirectionHints.Top"> <uif-button menuTrigger (click)="openMenu2 = !openMenu2"> <span [hidden]="openMenu2">Open</span> <span [hidden]="!openMenu2">Close</span> Contextual Menu</uif-button> <div menuItemHeader> Animals</div> <div menuItem *ngFor="let item of menuItems">{{item.text}}</div> <div menuItemDivider> Animals</div> <div menuItemHeader> Spices</div> <div menuItem *ngFor="let item of menuItems2">{{item.text}}</div> </uif-contextualmenu> <div class="horizontal-separator"></div> <h4>Multiselect Contextual Menu</h4> <uif-contextualmenu [(isOpen)]="openMenu3" [isMultiSelect]="isMultiSelect" [directionHint]="DirectionHints.Top"> <uif-button menuTrigger (click)="openMenu3 = !openMenu3"> <span [hidden]="openMenu3">Open</span> <span [hidden]="!openMenu3">Close</span> Contextual Menu</uif-button> <div menuItemHeader> Animals</div> <menu-item *ngFor="let item of menuItems3; let i = index" [selected]="item.selected" [disabled]="i == 4">{{item.text}}</menu-item> </uif-contextualmenu> <div class="horizontal-separator"></div> <h4> Contextual Menu with another nested Contextual Menu</h4> <uif-contextualmenu [(isOpen)]="openMenu4" [isMultiSelect]="isMultiSelect" [directionHint]="DirectionHints.Top"> <uif-button menuTrigger (click)="openMenu4 = !openMenu4"> <span [hidden]="openMenu4">Open</span> <span [hidden]="!openMenu4">Close</span> Contextual Menu</uif-button> <menu-item>Jones</menu-item> <menu-item>Kivell</menu-item> <menu-item>Jardine</menu-item> <menu-item> <span>Gill</span> <uif-contextualmenu> <div menuItem> Animals</div> <div menuItem *ngFor="let item of menuItems">{{item.text}}</div> </uif-contextualmenu> </menu-item> <!-- <menu-item *ngFor="let item of menuItems; let i = index" [selected]="item.selected" [disabled]="i == 4">{{item.text}}</menu-item> --> </uif-contextualmenu> </div>

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UifContextualMenuDirectionHint } from '../../uif-fabric/uif-contextual-menu/uif-contextual-menu.models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-contextualmenu-demo', templateUrl: './app-contextualmenu-demo.component.html', }) export class ContextualMenuDemoComponent { openMenu1 = false; openMenu2 = false; openMenu3 = false; openMenu4 = false; openSubMenu4 = true; dirHintMenu2 = UifContextualMenuDirectionHint.Top; DirectionHints = UifContextualMenuDirectionHint; menuItems = [ { key: 'panda', text: 'Panda', selected: true }, { key: 'koala', text: 'Koala', selected: false }, { key: 'sloth', text: 'Sloth', selected: false } ]; menuItems2 = [ { key: 'Ginger', text: 'Ginger', selected: true }, { key: 'Pepper', text: 'Pepper', selected: false }, { key: 'Cardamom', text: 'Cardamom', selected: false } ]; menuItems3 = [ { key: 'panda', text: 'Panda', selected: true }, { key: 'koala', text: 'Koala', selected: false }, { key: 'sloth', text: 'Sloth', selected: false }, { key: 'bear', text: 'Bear', selected: false }, { key: 'boar', text: 'Boar', selected: false} ]; isMultiSelect = true; }

<h2>uif-datepicker</h2> <div style="display: block; padding: 0 0 24px 0;"> <form> <div style="display:inline-block;"> <h4>First day of week hint</h4> <select name="selectedWeekDay" [(ngModel)]="selectedWeekDay"> <option *ngFor="let hint of weekDayHints" [value]="hint.key">{{hint.text}}</option> </select> </div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <h4>Current Date : {{dt}}</h4> <uif-datepicker [(isOpen)]="datePickerOpened1" [(date)]="dt" [firstDayOfWeek]="selectedWeekDay"> <uif-open-datepicker> <input name="dt" type="date" style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; line-height: 24px; min-width: 300px;" [(ngModel)]="dt" /> <uif-button (click)="datePickerOpened1 = !datePickerOpened1"> <span [hidden]="!datePickerOpened1">Close</span> <span [hidden]="datePickerOpened1">Open</span> Datepicker</uif-button> </uif-open-datepicker> </uif-datepicker> <h4>Datepicker with minDate and maxDate</h4> <h5 style="margin: 5px 0; font-weight: 100;">minDate: {{minDate}}</h5> <h5 style="margin: 5px 0; font-weight: 100;">maxDate: {{maxDate}}</h5> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <uif-datepicker [(isOpen)]="datePickerOpened2" [(date)]="dt" [firstDayOfWeek]="selectedWeekDay" [minDate]="minDate" [maxDate]="maxDate"> <uif-open-datepicker> <input name="dt" type="date" style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: middle; line-height: 24px; min-width: 300px;" [(ngModel)]="dt" /> <uif-button (click)="datePickerOpened2 = !datePickerOpened2"> <span [hidden]="!datePickerOpened2">Close</span> <span [hidden]="datePickerOpened2">Open</span> Datepicker</uif-button> </uif-open-datepicker> </uif-datepicker> </form> </div>

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { WeekDay } from '../../uif-fabric/uif-datepicker/uif-datepicker.models'; @Component({ selector: 'app-datepicker-demo', templateUrl: './app-datepicker-demo.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app-datepicker-demo.component.scss'] }) export class DatepickerComponent { datePickerOpened1: boolean | Boolean = false; datePickerOpened2: boolean | Boolean = false; dt; minDate; maxDate; weekDayHints = [ { key: WeekDay.Sunday, text: 'Sunday' }, { key: WeekDay.Monday, text: 'Monday' }, { key: WeekDay.Tuesday, text: 'Tuesday' }, { key: WeekDay.Wednesday, text: 'Wednesday' }, { key: WeekDay.Thursday, text: 'Thursday' }, { key: WeekDay.Friday, text: 'Friday' }, { key: WeekDay.Saturday, text: 'Saturday' }, ]; selectedWeekDay: WeekDay = WeekDay.Sunday; constructor() { this.dt = new Date(); this.minDate = new Date(); this.maxDate = new Date(); this.minDate.setMonth(this.minDate.getMonth() - 1); this.maxDate.setMonth(this.maxDate.getMonth() + 1); } }

<h2>uif-dialog</h2> <div style="display: block; padding: 0 0 24px 0;"> <form> <div style="display:inline-block;"> <h4>Is Closeable</h4> <select name="isCloseable" [(ngModel)]="isCloseable"> <option *ngFor="let hint of closeHints" [value]="hint.key">{{hint.text}}</option> </select> </div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div style="display:inline-block;"> <h4>Is Blocking</h4> <select name="isBlocking" [(ngModel)]="isBlocking"> <option *ngFor="let hint of closeHints" [value]="hint.key">{{hint.text}}</option> </select> </div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div style="display:inline-block;"> <h4>Is Large Header</h4> <select name="isLargeHeader" [(ngModel)]="isLargeHeader"> <option *ngFor="let hint of closeHints" [value]="hint.key">{{hint.text}}</option> </select> </div> </form> <div style="display:block; margin: 30px auto;text-align:center"> <button class="ms-Button" (click)="isDialogOpened = !isDialogOpened"> <span class="ms-Button-label"> <span [hidden]="isDialogOpened">Open</span> <span [hidden]="!isDialogOpened">Close</span> Dialog</span> </button> <br /> </div> <uif-dialog [(isOpen)]="isDialogOpened" [isBlocking]="getBoolean(isBlocking)" [isCloseable]="getBoolean(isCloseable)" [isLargeHeader]="getBoolean(isLargeHeader)"> <div uifDialogHeader>All emails together</div> <uif-dialog-content> <p class="ms-Dialog-subText">Your Inbox has changed. No longer does it include favorites, it is a singular destination for your emails.</p> <div class="ms-CheckBox"> <input tabindex="-1" type="checkbox" class="ms-CheckBox-input"> <label role="checkbox" class="ms-CheckBox-field" tabindex="0" aria-checked="false" name="checkboxa"> <span class="ms-Label">Option1</span> </label> </div> <div class="ms-CheckBox"> <input tabindex="-1" type="checkbox" class="ms-CheckBox-input"> <label role="checkbox" class="ms-CheckBox-field" tabindex="0" aria-checked="false" name="checkboxa"> <span class="ms-Label">Option2</span> </label> </div> </uif-dialog-content> <uif-dialog-footer> <button class="ms-Button ms-Dialog-action ms-Button--primary" (click)="isDialogOpened = false"> <span class="ms-Button-label">Save</span> </button> <button class="ms-Button ms-Dialog-action" (click)="isDialogOpened = false"> <span class="ms-Button-label">Cancel</span> </button> </uif-dialog-footer> </uif-dialog> </div>

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dialog-demo', templateUrl: './app-dialog-demo.component.html' }) export class DialogDemoComponent { isDialogOpened: boolean | Boolean = false; isBlocking: boolean | Boolean = true; isCloseable: boolean | Boolean = true; isLargeHeader: boolean | Boolean = true; closeHints = [ { key: true, text: 'Yes'}, { key: false, text: 'No'} ]; getBoolean(val): boolean { if (typeof val === 'boolean') { return val; } else { return val === 'false' ? false : true; } } }

<h2>uif-dropdown</h2> <div style="display: block; padding: 0 0 24px 0;"> <form> <div style="display:inline-block;"> <h4>Is MultiSelectable</h4> <select name="isMultiSelectableHints" [(ngModel)]="isMultiSelectable"> <option *ngFor="let hint of isMultiSelectableHints" [value]="hint.key">{{hint.text}}</option> </select> </div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div class="vertical-separator"></div> <div style="display:inline-block;"> <h4>Disabled</h4> <select name="disableDropdown" [(ngModel)]="disableDropdown"> <option *ngFor="let hint of isMultiSelectableHints" [value]="hint.key">{{hint.text}}</option> </select> </div> </form> <div class="horizontal-separator"></div> <h4>Current Items:</h4> <pre style="font-weight: 100; font-size: small;">{{getOptionsJson()}}</pre> <div class="horizontal-separator"></div> <h4>Default Dropdown</h4> <uif-dropdown [showSelectedText]="getBoolean(showSelectedText)" [isMultiSelectable]="getBoolean(isMultiSelectable)" [(options)]="options" [isDisabled]="getBoolean(disableDropdown)" ></uif-dropdown> <div class="horizontal-separator"></div> <h4>Dropdown with custom option template</h4> <uif-dropdown [isMultiSelectable]="getBoolean(isMultiSelectable)" [isDisabled]="getBoolean(disableDropdown)"> <uif-dropdown-option *ngFor="let option of options" [(selected)]="option.selected" [text]="option.text"> <span style="display: block; padding: 0 10px;">{{option.selected}} | {{option.text}} <span [hidden]="!option.selected"> | {{option.extra}}</span></span> </uif-dropdown-option> </uif-dropdown> </div>

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dropdown-demo', templateUrl: './app-dropdown-demo.component.html' }) export class DropdownDemoComponent { isMultiSelectable = true; options = [ { key: 'dogBarking', text: 'Dog Barking', selected: false, extra: 'woof woof woof woof' }, { key: 'mindBlowing', text: 'Wind Blowing', selected: true, extra: 'sshh sshhh ssshhh ssssshhhhhh ' }, { key: 'duckQuacking', text: 'Duck Quacking', selected: false, extra: 'quack quack quack quack' }, { key: 'cowMooing', text: 'Cow Mooing', selected: false, extra: 'moo moo moo moo' } ]; isMultiSelectableHints = [ { key: true, text: 'Yes'}, { key: false, text: 'No'} ]; showSelectedText = true; disableDropdown = false; getJSON(val: any) { return JSON.stringify(val); } getOptionsJson() { return this.options.map((option) => { return ` \n key: ${option.key}, text: ${option.text}, selected: ${option.selected}`; }); } getBoolean(val): boolean { if (typeof val === 'boolean') { return val; } else { return val === 'false' ? false : true; } } }

import { NgModule } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { FormsModule } from '@angular/forms'; import { UiFabricModule } from '../uif-fabric/uif-fabric.module'; import { BreadcrumbDemoComponent } from './app-breadcrumb-demo/app-breadcrumb-demo.component'; import { ButtonDemoComponent } from './app-button-demo/app-button-demo.component'; import { CalloutDemoComponent } from './app-callout-demo/app-callout-demo.component'; import { ContextualMenuDemoComponent } from './app-contextualmenu-demo/app-contextualmenu-demo.component'; import { DatepickerComponent } from './app-datepicker-demo/app-datepicker-demo.component'; import { DialogDemoComponent } from './app-dialog-demo/app-dialog-demo.component'; import { DropdownDemoComponent } from './app-dropdown-demo/app-dropdown-demo.component'; const COMPONENTS = [ BreadcrumbDemoComponent, ButtonDemoComponent, CalloutDemoComponent, ContextualMenuDemoComponent, DatepickerComponent, DialogDemoComponent, DropdownDemoComponent ]; @NgModule({ declarations: COMPONENTS, imports: [ CommonModule, FormsModule, UiFabricModule ], exports: COMPONENTS, providers: [] }) export class DemoModule { }
